price: Свака душа смрт ће да осети, а онда ћете Нама да будете враћени.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti thumma ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
